scripts.package:skill: set -e; mkdir -p dist; rm -f dist/animated-image.zip; SKILL_DIR=skills/animated-image; TEMP_ENV=0; if [ -f "$SKILL_DIR/.env" ]; then :; elif [ -f .env ]; then cp .env "$SKILL_DIR/.env"; TEMP_ENV=1; fi; (cd "$SKILL_DIR" && zip -rq ../../dist/animated-image.zip .); if [ "$TEMP_ENV" = 1 ]; then rm -f "$SKILL_DIR/.env"; fi; echo Packaged: dist/animated-image.zip
